steps: step 2: Login at https://testops.staging.katalon.com/login --> navigate to Page_home
step 3: At Page_home click on button_select_organization
step 4: At Page_home click on button_object
step 5: At Page_home click on hyperlink_user --> navigate to Page_user_settings
step 6: At Page_user_settings click on hyperlink_user_apikey --> navigate to Page_user_apikey
step 7: At Page_user_apikey click on button_toggle_apikey_visibility
step 8: At Page_user_apikey click on time_object
step 9: At Page_user_apikey click on div_object
step 10: At Page_user_apikey click on input_object
step 11: At Page_user_apikey click on button_remove_api_key
step 12: Add visual checkpoint at Page_user_apikey
